text: Just saw @holly_cummins talk about running WebSphere on a hat. That gives me soooo many ideas... :) #buildstuffua

author.description: Codes, chords n'conferences. Keynote speaker, guitarist, CEO @Ursatile, Microsoft MVP. Creator of @RockstarLang. Organiser @LondonDotNet. Слава Україні. He/him.
